title: Lag switcher
body: can you please ban TheNewmstahlad. He was using a lag switching program and it really bugged the crap out of my team and i. he said that he had our ip adresses. everytime anyone of us got close or was running way, we would be frozen in place but the program he was using. All of our internet connections were fine. we may not have any proof but please look into this.

replies.body: Hey thanks for letting the community know about these issues. We have enough problems as it is with AFK, trolls and toxicity. Make sure that next time you use a support card. Try using [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
Name and shame... When's a red going to read and remove?
oh it's my first time here. i didnt know
Yes because bitching here instead of sending in a support ticket should totally be your first thought before coming on boards.
again i didnt know? jeez didnt know you guys were this aggressive

> [{quoted}](name=Marshdeath,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=Oj4bWOt0,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-15T00:59:58.414+0000)
>
> again i didnt know? jeez didnt know you guys were this aggressive

Trust me, it's just him. Just remove the name and add censored or something and send a support ticket and you'll be fine
